creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Dr and Mrs Sherman Lee
description: two haggard looking women; front woman in light yellow-green kimono with black obi is much older with large, exaggerated, drooping facial features; carries a long switch in PR hand and plant sprigs with small white flowers in PL hand; kerchief on head; younger woman in back wears light blue-green kimono with green shawl; carries a large bundle in both hands; both wear sandals and have rough looking feet
title: Two Women
